results.creator_credit: Eric Thompson and Australian National Film Board
results.brief_description: Shows inspection and fumigation of imported timber to prevent the wood-boring wasp Sirex noctilio from entering Australia.

results.title: Destruction Derby
results.brief_description: In this animated fable with no narration, a caveman builds a car and soon the whole planet is overrun with cars, trucks and airplanes and the air choked with polluting fumes. The imaginative cartoon focuses on one aspect of destruction to the environment and offers a tongue-in-cheek solution - send all cars off in a rocket, into outer space.

results.title: Destroyer
results.brief_description: Erin Bell is an LAPD detective who was placed undercover with a Californian gang with tragic results. When the leader re-emerges years later, she must work her way back into her own history to finally reckon with the demons that destroyed her past.

constellations_other.name: 1960s television
constellations_other.description: After its debut in the fifties, Australians rapidly became enthusiastic television viewers in the sixties as American imports started to be mixed with notable local productions.

results.description: Erin Bell is an LAPD detective who, as a young cop, was placed undercover with a gang in the California desert with tragic results. When the leader of that gang re-emerges many years later, she must work her way back through the remaining members and into her own history with them to finally reckon with the demons that destroyed her past.
description_for_label: Erin Bell is an LAPD detective who, as a young cop, was placed undercover with a gang in the California desert with tragic results. When the leader of that gang re-emerges many years later, she must work her way back through the remaining members and into her own history with them to finally reckon with the demons that destroyed her past.

results.title: Destiny of a man = Sudba cheloveka
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Films of the great victory 1941-1945”.
Melancholy and sympathetic view of the tragedies suffered by a family man and WW2 POW survivor. Haunted by his experiences in a concentration camp the man has survived this appalling event by clinging to the hope of reuniting with his wife and child. Directed by, and also starring Sergei Bondarchuk, this was a successful film that with its unstinting humanism, proved the ability of Russian filmmakers to combine cinematic beauty with compassionate sentiment.

results.title: Destiny in Alice
results.brief_description: In the heart of Australia, one of the harshest places on the planet, the town of Alice Springs has become a haven for lesbians, confronting the challenges of loving across racial and cultural gaps.

constellations_other.name: Broadcasting marginal voices
constellations_other.description: The creation of Indigenous broadcasting in Central Australia from the late 1970s meant an array of diverse Black stories could be shared. Today, important stories told by those who physically and metaphorically live on the margins can be broadcast widely.

results.description: In the heart of Australia, one of the harshest places on the planet, the town of Alice Springs has become a haven for lesbians, confronting the challenges of loving across racial and cultural gaps.
description_for_label: In the heart of Australia, one of the harshest places on the planet, the town of Alice Springs has become a haven for lesbians, confronting the challenges of loving across racial and cultural gaps.

results.title: Destiny's Angel
results.creator_credit: Craig Cottle and Craig Cottle Productions
results.brief_description: A young girl reacting unhappily to her parents’ recent divorce alienates herself from her girlfriends when she continually fails to attend ballet practice for a school performance. In the meantime, she forms a friendship with an old man who is the caretaker of the local conservatory, and, through him, comes to understand that problems must be confronted rather than avoided if a solution is to be found. Sadly, her friendship with the old man comes to an end with his death. This film raises issues for discussion such as responsibilities towards others, family situations, human relationships, old age and death. Cast includes Roy Witham and Saba Sluyter.

results.title: Destinos: an introduction to Spanish. Pt. 2
results.brief_description: A series of introductory Spanish language programs with each program structured carefully so that three kinds of Spanish are used: conversational Spanish spoken by the characters in the drama, the narrator’s Spanish and the Spanish spoken by the instructor, Raquel, who breaks in periodically during the episode to explain and reinforce particular language structures and grammar. We also learn about the Spanish speaking world, its culture, life and customs.

results.title: Destinos: an introduction to Spanish
results.brief_description: A series of introductory Spanish language programmes, in the form of a long-running mystery drama about Don Fernando and the secrets of his past. Learn Spanish while the mystery takes you all over the Spanish speaking world. Each programme is structured carefully so that three kinds of Spanish are used. Conversational Spanish, which is spoken by the characters in the drama. The narrator’s Spanish, and the Spanish spoken by the instructor, Raquel, who breaks in periodically during the episode to explain and re-inforce particular language structures and grammar. In this series, you will learn about the Spanish speaking world, its culture, life and customs.

results.title: Destination: science
results.creator_credit: Fern Field, EPCOT Educational Media and Focal Video
results.brief_description: Combines animation and live action as Donald Duck is invited to tour the world of science beyond the laboratory. Flight, the electric light bulb and computers are used to illustrate the relevance of inquiry and discovery in our daily lives. Part of the series “Journey to tomorrow”.

results.title: Destination: Port of Melbourne
results.creator_credit: Norman Godbold and Pan Pacific Pictures
results.brief_description: Follows the docking of a container ship. Aerial views show the layout of the port and ground shots provide a feeling of great activity in the port.
